title.rendered: STEDI FORD RANGER WILDTRAK FX4 ROOF LIGHT BAR MOUNTING BRACKET

content.rendered:
Ford Ranger Wildtrak & FX4, PX1 and PX2 Roof LED Light Bar mounts.

THAT PRERUNNER VIBE.

The STEDI Roof Rail bracket to suit Ford Ranger Wildtrak, is designed to secure 40.5″ to 42″ light bars between the factory roof rails. Unlike other solutions on the market , installation does not require you to drill any holes in your pillars or roof, making it 100% reversible. Compatible with all Wildtrak models fitted with roof rails.

FITS LIKE A WELL TAILORED SUIT 

Our Wildtrak roof mounts locate at perfect proximity from the windscreen to ensure zero glare or unwanted reflection. The height and depth have been optimised to achieve a cohesive and proportionate fit that looks aggressive while maintaining that OEM vibe.

LIGHT BAR COMPATIBILITY

Fits our popular ST2K 40.5″, ST4K-42″ and ST3K-41.5″ lights.

DETAILS

Finally, a roof light bar mounting solution that doesn’t involve drilling or other intrusive fasteners. Designed and engineered specifically for the Ford Ranger Wildtrak & FX4 (PX1, PX2 & PX3), using 3mm stainless steel finished in a satin UV stable powder coating.

Designed to bolt to existing fasteners on the underside of roof railing, our Wildtrak roof bracket is designed to fit our ST4K 42″, ST3K 41.5″ &  our ST2K 40.5″ series light bars (sold seperately)

Whilst our Wildtrak brackets may suit other similar size light bars, we ask customer to take caution as we have only torture tested using the above STEDI bars.

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL 3mm Stainless Steel
FITS Ford Ranger Wildtrak FX4 PX1, PX2, PX3  2012 to Current

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Set of Ford Ranger Wildtrak Roof Brackets
  • 4 x Stainless button head bolts
  • 4 x Stainless steel flat washers
